name: Artifact
passiveSkills: Permanently Increase MAGIC by 15% at the start of your turn
Gain 50% Fury after your first attack in battle
Generate 10% Fury, Heal allies based on your MAGIC stat, and grant Perfect Accuracy to self for 1 turn when you take damage
15% Chance to inflict Perfect Stun on a random enemy for 2 turns and a 20% chance to Remove All Negative Effects, including Silver Effects, from self when you take damage.
